@JadenGeller I am not a fan of implicit conversions.  Stay strong!
@nothings inverting unsigned 32 bit value, then sign extending it to 64 bit will leave all the upper 32 bits clear. Cast first, then invert.
After extending a variable to 64 bits, the common clear-bit pattern of bits&=~bit clears the upper 32 bits when bit isn't 64 bits wide.
